mapper.select: select a.id task_id,a.name,a.type,d1.name typeName,a.create_time,a.complete_status,t.`name` teamName,a.team_Id,a.start_time,a.end_time from ljcx_task a left join sys_dic_desc d1 on d1.id = a.type and d1.code = 'TASK_TYPE' left join ljcx_team_info t on t.id = a.team_id where a.id = #{id}
select (case complete_status when 0 then 'not_ok' else 'ok' end ) `name`,count(1) `value` from ljcx_task where team_id = #{teamId} and is_delete =1 group by complete_status

select a.`name`,count(b.id) `value` from sys_dic_desc a left join ljcx_task b on a.id = b.type and a.code = 'TASK_TYPE' and b.team_id = #{teamId} and b.is_delete = 1 GROUP BY a.id,a.`name` order by a.id asc

select case INTERVAL(flight_hours,5,10,15,20,25,30,35,9999999) when 0 then 'i_0' when 1 then 'i_1' when 2 then 'i_2' when 3 then 'i_3' when 4 then 'i_4' when 5 then 'i_5' when 6 then 'i_6' when 7 then 'i_7' else 'i_8' end `name` ,count(id) `value` from (select a.id,ifnull(ROUND(sum(flight_seconds)/3600,2),0) flight_hours from ljcx_task a left join ljcx_task_records b on a.id = b.task_id where a.team_id = #{teamId} and a.is_delete = 1 group by a.id ) a GROUP BY `name` order by `name` asc
select ifnull(ROUND(sum(flight_seconds)/3600,2),0) from ljcx_task a left join ljcx_task_records b on a.id = b.task_id where a.team_id = #{teamId} and a.is_delete = 1
